name: Luminar 2018 Project File
summary: An LMNR file is a project file created by Luminar, a digital photo-editing application. It contains an image that has been edited in Luminar, as well as a record of the edits that have been made to that image. While previous versions of Luminar used LMNR files, current versions of the application do not support LMNR files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
